name: Avcının Yolu
desc: Bu yaldızlı yay, değerli dallar kullanılarak yapıldı. Ormana sızmaya çalışan sayısız canavarın son durağı olmuştur.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Kavurucu Kuvvetin Yankısı
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.

A long time ago, the people of the Lord of Deserts carved these imperial insignias based on robust beetles to memorialize the bright sun that marked the shifting of day and night, as well as the infinity of such times.

Though the name of that Lord is no longer mentioned, these imperial insignias have been preserved through time, each bearing a faint ambiance of those past glories.

These insignias travel with the descendants of the Eremite Tribe, silently telling the tales of their then-Lord.

materials.name: Etkisizleştirilmiş Mantar Özü
materials.desc:
Body tissue left behind by a Fungus that has been exposed to intense elemental stimulation.

Its soothing texture makes it shockingly good for stress relief.

However, frequent usage can also easily lead to the Fungi multiplying, and thus the material is not suitable for any commercial use.

materials.name: Soluk Kırmızı Saten
materials.desc:
A piece of red satin used to cover the eyes. The fabric is slightly torn.

Many Eremites tend to cover their eyes with textiles, but the original intention of this practice has long been lost to the sands of time.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Kavurucu Kuvvetin Kalan Parıltısı
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
To weave together myriad thoughts and reign over countless souls — this is the essence of power.
However, power is not cold-blooded tyranny. Its true ideal, at its heart, is to create a utopia free of worry, schemes, and slavery.
It was just as the silent lord saw in the crystal's secrets, and just as the lost companion had once taught.
The dark insect insignia and the steel judgment thus laid the foundations of the kingdom's rules.

materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
To weave together myriad thoughts and reign over countless souls — this is the essence of power.
However, power is not cold-blooded tyranny. Its true ideal, at its heart, is to create a utopia free of worry, schemes, and slavery.
It was just as the silent lord saw in the crystal's secrets, and just as the lost companion had once taught.
The dark insect insignia and the steel judgment thus laid the foundations of the kingdom's rules.

materials.name: Pasif Mantar Özü
materials.desc:
Body tissue left behind by a Fungus that has been exposed to intense elemental stimulation.

There was once a protracted debate among Amurta researchers on whether the Fungi should be categorized as plants or animals. In the end, they reached an agreement and closed the case for good - the Fungi shall be its own category, neither plant nor animal.

materials.name: İşlemeli Kırmızı İpek
materials.desc:
A piece of red silk trimmed with simple decorations.

A seasoned warrior can detect weaknesses from their foe's eyes and thus take advantage. The Eremites have long since lost a master to serve, and now they have no one to trust but themselves.

Word has it that they are more than convinced that all things betray, even their own eyes.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Kavurucu Kuvvetin Rüyası
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.

Silver moonlight and clear springs once completed the scenery of the oases. But as the Lord of Flowers faded in the darkening sandstorm, so was the worriless golden paradise submerged by death.
In the poetry of the Eremite Tribe, the moon cast its silver light on the crimson mantle, causing Al-Ahmar, the Mourning King, to be driven to madness.
In a melancholic desert ballad, driven by the haunting nostalgia, the lonely king created an ever-youthful dreamland in the center of the desert, where undisturbed water sprang up and perpetual dusk remained.

materials.name: Pasif Mantar Özü

Weapon Ascension Material.

In the poetry of the Eremite Tribe, the moon cast its silver light on the crimson mantle, causing Al-Ahmar, the Mourning King, to be driven to madness.
In a melancholic desert ballad, driven by the haunting nostalgia, the lonely king created an ever-youthful dreamland in the center of the desert, where undisturbed water sprang up and perpetual dusk remained.

materials.name: Dinç Mantar Özü
materials.desc:
Body tissue left behind by a Fungus that has been exposed to intense elemental stimulation.

It is generally believed that the Fungi evolved into more mobile forms to better disperse their spores.

A poet once depicted a shared dream of the Fungi in which their spores covered every inch of the mountains and oceans. The world had never been more tranquil.

Then the Fungi turned into fish, birds, beasts, men, and gods, relying on rainfall, land, and their own kind who had returned to the earth.

materials.name: Koyu Kırmızı Sırmalı Kumaş
materials.desc:
A piece of red brocade woven with golden thread.

Those born in the gilded desert under the sun occasionally sing a song, of which the meaning has been forgotten. They would praise the scorching sun that illuminates the earth as equally as ever and bewail the afterglow at the end of the dusk. Some unfamiliar words recur at the end of the song, which are said to be the names of ancient gods. Legend has it that when the King of the Desert was still alive, his people chose to cover their eyes as they dared not look upon him, whose brilliance was beyond that of the sun.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Kavurucu Kuvvetin Eski Günleri
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.

In the era when the ignorant Lord of Deserts ruled, his power descended upon every inch of the land like the scorching sun.
Ancient stone tablets record that he turned his power into seven rays of blinding light or seven pillars, which he granted equally and mercifully to everyone. No one was neglected, nor was anyone discontented.
That was a forgotten golden era, an era when the Lord of Flowers had faded into the sands and the Lord of Verdure was determined to leave. Only the descendants in the yellow sand chose to follow their god. Even as the grim shadow of calamity loomed, the power in which they had faith shone brightly like amber and gold.
Yet calamity befell nonetheless, and the golden insectoid insignias were buried beneath the depths of shrine and palace, under collapsed pillars engraved with images of eagles and bulls.

materials.name: Dinç Mantar Özü
materials.desc:
Body tissue left behind by a Fungus that has been exposed to intense elemental stimulation.

It is generally believed that the Fungi evolved into more mobile forms to better disperse their spores.

A poet once depicted a shared dream of the Fungi in which their spores covered every inch of the mountains and oceans. The world had never been more tranquil.

Then the Fungi turned into fish, birds, beasts, men, and gods, relying on rainfall, land, and their own kind who had returned to the earth.

customize.text: Avcının Yolu, kuşanan karaktere <color=#ffd780>Kritik Oranı</color> sağlar ve pasifi sayesinde <color=#ffd780>Element Hasarı Bonusunu</color> ve <color=#ffd780>Element Ustalığına</color> oranla <color=#ffd780>Yüklü Saldırı Hasarını</color> artırır. Bu silah, <color=#ffd780>Yüklü Saldırı</color> kullanan ve <color=#ffd780>Element Tepkimesi</color> tetikleyen karakterler için iyi bir seçenektir. Aşağıda önerilen karakterler verilmiştir.

customize.name: Tighnari
customize.desc: Botanik dalında bilgili, Avidya Ormanı'nda Orman Gözcüsü görevini yürüten genç bir araştırmacı. Sıcak kalpli aklındakini doğrudan söyleyen ve en ruhsuz öğrencilere dahi rehberlik yapabilen yetenekli biridir.

customize.text: Tighnari, sürekli <color=#ffacff>Aşırı Yükleme</color> tepkimesi tetikleyerek <color=#ffd780>Yüklü Saldırılarıyla</color> yüksek <color=#ffd780>Hasar</color> verir. <color=#ffd780>Element Ustalığı</color> ile güçlendiği için bu silah Tighnari'nin <color=#ffd780>Hasarını</color> artırır. Bu silah, Tighnari'nin imza silahıdır.

customize.name: Ganyu
customize.desc: Yuehai Konağı sekreteri. Damarlarında aydınlanmış bir yaratık olan Qilin'in kanı akar.

customize.text: Ganyu, özellikle <color=#99ffff>Erime</color> takımlarında oynandığı zaman <color=#ffd780>Element Ustalığına</color> ihtiyaç duyar. Bu silah, Ganyu'ya hem <color=#ffd780>Element Hasar Bonusu</color> hem de <color=#ffd780>Element Ustalığına</color> oranla <color=#ffd780>Yüklü Saldırı Hasarı</color> sağlayacağı için <color=#99ffff>Erime</color> takımlarında kullanabileceği en iyi silahtır.

value.text: Tüm Element Hasarları için <color=#37ffff>%12/15/18/21/24</color> Bonus sağlar. Karakter, bir düşmana Yüklü Saldırı ile vurduğunda Amansız Av etkisi kazanır. Bu etki, Yüklü Saldırı Hasarını Element Ustalığının <color=#37ffff>%160/200/240/280/320</color> 'ı kadar artırır. Bu etki, 12 Yüklü Saldırı veya 10 saniye sonrasında kaybolur. Her 12 saniyede 1 defa Amansız Av kazanılabilir.

desc.text:
<color=#ffffff73>Ormanın kutsamasına sahip beyaz dallardan yapılmış altın bir av yayı.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Bu tür beyaz dalları olan ağaçlar günümüzde nadiren görülür.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Bu lütuflar bir zamanlar kanla kaplanmıştı ancak kara lekeler suyla akıp gittiler.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Avcı, karanlık sürünün peşinde bitmeyen bir avdaydı.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Kurumuş yaprakların altında geçen geceler, et yığınlarının arasında geçen günler,</color>
<color=#ffffff73>hepsi avın kalbine nüfuz edecek ölümcül ok ve sıradaki hedefine yönelmek içindi.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Yavaş yavaş avcı, rüzgarın avına konumunu göstermesi konusunda veya</color>
<color=#ffffff73>insan kokusunu kamufle etmek için kır çiçekleri kullanmak hakkında endişelenmeyi bıraktı çünkü</color>
<color=#ffffff73>kokusu gitgide vahşi hayvanlara benzemeye başlamıştı.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Avcı olmadan çok önce insan dilini unuttu.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Sonu gelmeyen avı sırasında zamanı, geceyi ve gündüzü de unutmaya başlamıştı.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Tıpkı ona vaat edilen sonsuz avlanma alanları gibi.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Onu ilk bulan ve beyaz dallardan yapılmış yayı veren</color>
<color=#ffffff73>ve karanlık hayvanların yoluna götüren kör genci bile,</color>
<color=#ffffff73>kendini tamamen avlanmaya adadığı için unuttu.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>"Çünkü elini kana bulayanlar, sonsuz yeşillikteki avlanma alanlarını asla bulamaz."</color>
<color=#ffffff73>"Hayır efendim, barbar canavarların dolaştığı bu dünya benim avlanma alanım olacak..."</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Avcı, ay ışığının altındaki berrak suya bakarken farkında olmadan vahşi bir canavara dönüştüğünü fark etti.</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Canavarın izini sürerek afallamış avcıyı bulan kılıçlı bir şövalyenin yansıması suya yansıdı...</color>
<color=#ffffff73>"Sudaki dolunayın yansımasıyla sersemlemiş ve yok edilmesi gereken bir canavardan başka bir şey değilsin."</color>
<color=#ffffff73>"Ne tuhaf. Bir an için ormanda kaybolmuş bir kız gördüğümü sanmıştım..."</color>
<color=#ffffff73>"Batıya doğru gitmeliyim. Adalet adına... İnsanı bir canavar biçimine sokma durumunu çözmek adına."</color>
